mapper.select:

FROM shop_product_type a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shop_product_type( id, shop_id, office_id, app_type, name, parent_id, parent_name, parent_ids, level_no, sort, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{shopId}, #{office.id}, #{appType}, #{name}, #{parent.id}, #{parentName}, #{parentIds}, #{levelNo}, #{sort}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE shop_product_type SET shop_id = #{shopId}, office_id = #{office.id}, app_type = #{appType}, name = #{name}, parent_id = #{parent.id}, parent_name = #{parentName}, parent_ids = #{parentIds}, level_no = #{levelNo}, sort = #{sort}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE shop_product_type SET del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_DELETE} WHERE id = #{id} OR parent_ids LIKE '%,'||#{id}||',%' WHERE id = #{id} OR parent_ids LIKE '%,'+#{id}+',%' WHERE id = #{id} OR parent_ids LIKE concat('%,',#{id},',%')
